description: Yeehaa excels in transformative design with extensive experience in both academics and industry. With a background in cognitive science and a career spanning various high-impact roles, Yeehaa brings a unique blend of creativity and analytical skills to any team. Accomplished in innovation, project leadership, and user-centered design, Yeehaa is driven by a passion for creating impactful solutions. They authored 'Align The Misaligned,' focusing on ecosystem architecture and curated a course with the same title emphasizing alignment and effectiveness.
blurb: The internet's fragmentation mimics the physical world. Ecosystem architecture combines decentralization and regenerative design to transform digital fragments into seeds for a vibrant future.
